seriesStmt.p: The Valley of the Shadow: Two Communities in the American Civil War

seriesStmt.title: University of Virginia Library, Valley of the Shadow collection

titleStmt.title: CHAP. LIV. Confederate Correspondence.
The War of The Rebellion: Official Records of the Union and Confederate Armies
chap liv confederate correspondence
titleStmt.author: Withers, John

change.item: Converted markup (originally TEI Lite) to comply with the UVa Library TEI DTD (uva-dl-tei).

div1.p: Slaves provided an important source of manpower for the Confederate war effort. The Confederate government often resorted to impressing the slaves of private citizens for military work. This list sets slave contribution quotas for Virginia counties and cities.

div1.head: A list of counties upon which to base a call for 5,000 slaves for labor on the fortifications to serve for thirty days.
